front.title: A NETCONF Datamodel for Diff-Serv QoS Control Configuration

abstract.t: This memo proposes a NETCONF datamodel for Differentiated Service (Diff-Serv) QoS control and an XML Schema to define the model. This model contains functional elements on a Diff-Serv router and Traffic Data Path. In this model, each Traffic Data Path is represented as the combination of the functional elements. Network operators can configure Diff-Serv routers distributed in their provider network by this datamodel and NETCONF protocol.
